flawed_nl_solution:
He sold 10+12+9=<<10+12+9=13>>13 bicycles.
He bought 15+8+11=<<15+8+11=34>>34 bicycles.
He now has 34-13=<<34-13=21>>21 more than at Friday's opening.
#### 21

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 31, not 13. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
